a1: All common image formats including JPEG, PNG, GIF, and WebP. The output is always PNG for maximum quality.
q2: Will my image be uploaded to a server?
a2: No, all image processing happens entirely in your browser using the HTML5 Canvas API. Your images never leave your device.
a3: The tool uses cover-fit cropping, which scales and centers the image to fill the target dimensions while maintaining aspect ratio, cropping edges as needed.
